charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was exploring a cave
when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Cynthia standing with Lucario.
Cynthia’s eyes were closed.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_0401_040: This is part of my training.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_0402_060:
I’m training. Heh heh, did you think I was just
taking a rest?
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_070:
I face Lucario with a clear mind in order to train
mentally, in addition to working on my strength
and moves.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_080:
Lucario is able to sense the auras of all things
and can read his opponents’ thoughts.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_090:
Of course, I could never hope to attain that mental
state myself...
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_100:
But if I train mentally and concentrate during
battle, I might be able to understand at least
some of my opponents’ thoughts and goals...
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_110: So that’s why I’m training like this.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_120:
I just hope it can bring me even one step closer to
Lucario, who can freely manipulate auras.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_130:
I’ll admit, though, that when we first met, I really
struggled with those auras.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_140:
But now Lucario and I have known each other
for quite a long time.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_150:
Ever since... Yes, I was still a new Trainer
traveling around the Sinnoh region.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_160: Lucario was still Riolu at the time.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_170:
When I met him, he was already able to sense the
feelings of others.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_180:
It was pretty difficult to become close at first,
because he could see right through to the very
depths of my heart.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_190: Since he could see even my greatest flaws...
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_210:
But...as our bond grew and he evolved
into Lucario...
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_220: I started to view that as our greatest weapon.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_230:
Even knowing every last secret within my heart
and mind...
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_240:
Lucario is still willing to help me and battle by my
side. I can’t imagine a more reliable partner.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_250:
During our travels through Sinnoh, and when we
visited other regions afterward...
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_260:
Lucario and I faced all manner of challengers—
and together, we were victorious!
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_270: I’m sure it will be the same in the future.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_280: Lucario will always be my dear, precious partner.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_0301_290: Is he saying he feels the same?
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_0401_300: Yes, I think he probably is.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_0302_310: Is he saying he knows you mean it?
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_330: Lucario can always tell if someone is lying.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_340: But it’s not just Lucario who can do that.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_350:
If you lie to a Pokémon, it’ll always see right
through you.
charaepi_ch0091_10_shirona/2301_1201_360:
So whenever you interact with a Pokémon, don’t
forget to face it honestly and openly—and to
show it how much you love it!
